pages.text: $(bred)Dolphin Rider Zombie$() loves dolphins very much, $(m)although dolphin ate its brain$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)30$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will dive into the water when swimming if the distance to target is far.$(l)It swims faster than walking$().
